posts.post_content:
Best (or at least silliest) pre-release moment came from one of these.  
  
So your mountain has come alive  
yes  
and it's now wearing boots  
yes  
and that means i can't block it because of this bojuka bog  
yes  
Magic is weird  
yes

Posted By: dgregory (2/1/2010 10:13:53 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: arguably the worst of the zendikons, and at least the second worst (guardian zendikon might be worse, though that's arguable since it blocks most creatures for 3 mana, which is alright). At least the other zendikons give you creatures that are above the mana curve if they were actual creatures and not mana enchantments (e.g. wind zendikon. A 2/2 flier for 1 mana would be ridiculous). This one doesn't.
posts.html:
arguably the worst of the zendikons, and at least the second worst (guardian zendikon might be worse, though that's arguable since it blocks most creatures for 3 mana, which is alright). At least the other zendikons give you creatures that are above the mana curve if they were actual creatures and not mana enchantments (e.g. wind zendikon. A 2/2 flier for 1 mana would be ridiculous). This one doesn't.

Rating:

posts.post_content: It's not that bad. It's a [Craw Wurm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Craw Wurm) for one less mana, or if you prefer, a Craw Wurm with haste for the same cost. The 'haste' effect is what makes the Zendikons somewhat worthwhile.
posts.html:
It's not that bad. It's a Craw Wurm for one less mana, or if you prefer, a Craw Wurm with haste for the same cost. The 'haste' effect is what makes the Zendikons somewhat worthwhile.
